definitions.definition: An itinerant tinsmith and mender of household utensils made of metal .
A member of the Irish Traveller community or of other itinerant groups; a gypsy .
definitions.label_groups: dated , chiefly British and Ireland , offensive

definitions.definition: A mischievous person, especially a playful, impish youngster.
Someone who repairs, or attempts repair, on anything mechanical, or who invents such devices; one who tinkers ; a tinkerer .
An act of repair or invention.
examples: I'll have a tinker and see what I can do.

definitions.definition: Any of various fish: chub mackerel , silverside , skate , or young mackerel about two years old.

main_definition: An itinerant tinsmith and mender of household utensils made of metal .
secondary_definitions: ( dated , chiefly British and Ireland , offensive ) A member of the Irish Traveller community or of other itinerant groups; a gypsy .
( usually with "little" ) A mischievous person, especially a playful, impish youngster.
Someone who repairs, or attempts repair, on anything mechanical, or who invents such devices; one who tinkers ; a tinkerer .
( informal ) An act of repair or invention.
Any of various fish: chub mackerel , silverside , skate , or young mackerel about two years old.
